description: Episode of Series "Problems of World Order". Tourism is now a giant worldwide industry providing an important source of revenue. This film shows how much of the heritage that we flock to see is being destroyed by tourism, modern technology and pollution. Discusses who should bear the cost and responsibility of this, using examples.
related_objects: Series; S01003; Problems of World Order; Active; 1973
